#### Layouts/HeaderLayout - Data Table
- Interface representing the slots for the HeaderLayout component. / export interface HeaderLayoutSlots { /** Optional slot for the header component. Should be a JSX element constructor that takes HeaderProps as props. / header?: JSXElementConstructor<HeaderProps>; /** Optional slot for the content component. Should be a JSX element constructor that takes ContentProps as props. / content?: JSXElementConstructor<ContentProps>; } /** Props for the HeaderLayout component slots. / export interface HeaderLayoutSlotProps { /** Props for the header slot. / header?: HeaderProps; /** Props for the content slot. / content?: ContentProps; } /** Represents an error that can occur in the HeaderLayout component. / export interface HeaderLayoutError { /** Optional icon to display with the error. / icon?: PlaceholderIcon; /** Optional title for the error. / title?: string; /** The error message to display. / message: string; } export type HeaderLayoutProps = PropsWithChildren<{ /** The title to be displayed in the header. / title: string | ReactElement; /** An optional subtitle to be displayed in the header. / subtitle?: string | ReactElement; /** Optional slots for custom components within the header layout. / slots?: HeaderLayoutSlots; /** Optional props for the custom slots. / slotProps?: HeaderLayoutSlotProps; /** Optional flag to indicate if the header layout is in a loading state. / loading?: boolean; /** Optional flag to indicate if the header layout is in a fetching state. / fetching?: boolean; /** Optional error object to be displayed in the header layout. / error?: HeaderLayoutError; }>; const DefaultErrorIcon = () => ( <ReportProblemIcon color="error" sx={{ width: 200, height: 200 }} /> ); /** A layout component that provides a header and content area with optional loading, fetching, and error states.
- [Layouts/HeaderLayout - Data Table](./?path=/story/layouts-headerlayout--data-table) {id:layouts-headerlayout--data-table} [story] [Docs](./?path=/docs/layouts-headerlayout--docs)

#### Layouts/HeaderLayout - Details
- Interface representing the slots for the HeaderLayout component. / export interface HeaderLayoutSlots { /** Optional slot for the header component. Should be a JSX element constructor that takes HeaderProps as props. / header?: JSXElementConstructor<HeaderProps>; /** Optional slot for the content component. Should be a JSX element constructor that takes ContentProps as props. / content?: JSXElementConstructor<ContentProps>; } /** Props for the HeaderLayout component slots. / export interface HeaderLayoutSlotProps { /** Props for the header slot. / header?: HeaderProps; /** Props for the content slot. / content?: ContentProps; } /** Represents an error that can occur in the HeaderLayout component. / export interface HeaderLayoutError { /** Optional icon to display with the error. / icon?: PlaceholderIcon; /** Optional title for the error. / title?: string; /** The error message to display. / message: string; } export type HeaderLayoutProps = PropsWithChildren<{ /** The title to be displayed in the header. / title: string | ReactElement; /** An optional subtitle to be displayed in the header. / subtitle?: string | ReactElement; /** Optional slots for custom components within the header layout. / slots?: HeaderLayoutSlots; /** Optional props for the custom slots. / slotProps?: HeaderLayoutSlotProps; /** Optional flag to indicate if the header layout is in a loading state. / loading?: boolean; /** Optional flag to indicate if the header layout is in a fetching state. / fetching?: boolean; /** Optional error object to be displayed in the header layout. / error?: HeaderLayoutError; }>; const DefaultErrorIcon = () => ( <ReportProblemIcon color="error" sx={{ width: 200, height: 200 }} /> ); /** A layout component that provides a header and content area with optional loading, fetching, and error states.
- [Layouts/HeaderLayout - Details](./?path=/story/layouts-headerlayout--details) {id:layouts-headerlayout--details} [story] [Docs](./?path=/docs/layouts-headerlayout--docs)

#### Layouts/HeaderLayout - Error
- Interface representing the slots for the HeaderLayout component. / export interface HeaderLayoutSlots { /** Optional slot for the header component. Should be a JSX element constructor that takes HeaderProps as props. / header?: JSXElementConstructor<HeaderProps>; /** Optional slot for the content component. Should be a JSX element constructor that takes ContentProps as props. / content?: JSXElementConstructor<ContentProps>; } /** Props for the HeaderLayout component slots. / export interface HeaderLayoutSlotProps { /** Props for the header slot. / header?: HeaderProps; /** Props for the content slot. / content?: ContentProps; } /** Represents an error that can occur in the HeaderLayout component. / export interface HeaderLayoutError { /** Optional icon to display with the error. / icon?: PlaceholderIcon; /** Optional title for the error. / title?: string; /** The error message to display. / message: string; } export type HeaderLayoutProps = PropsWithChildren<{ /** The title to be displayed in the header. / title: string | ReactElement; /** An optional subtitle to be displayed in the header. / subtitle?: string | ReactElement; /** Optional slots for custom components within the header layout. / slots?: HeaderLayoutSlots; /** Optional props for the custom slots. / slotProps?: HeaderLayoutSlotProps; /** Optional flag to indicate if the header layout is in a loading state. / loading?: boolean; /** Optional flag to indicate if the header layout is in a fetching state. / fetching?: boolean; /** Optional error object to be displayed in the header layout. / error?: HeaderLayoutError; }>; const DefaultErrorIcon = () => ( <ReportProblemIcon color="error" sx={{ width: 200, height: 200 }} /> ); /** A layout component that provides a header and content area with optional loading, fetching, and error states.
- [Layouts/HeaderLayout - Error](./?path=/story/layouts-headerlayout--error) {id:layouts-headerlayout--error} [story] [Docs](./?path=/docs/layouts-headerlayout--docs)

#### Layouts/HeaderLayout - Fetching
- Interface representing the slots for the HeaderLayout component. / export interface HeaderLayoutSlots { /** Optional slot for the header component. Should be a JSX element constructor that takes HeaderProps as props. / header?: JSXElementConstructor<HeaderProps>; /** Optional slot for the content component. Should be a JSX element constructor that takes ContentProps as props. / content?: JSXElementConstructor<ContentProps>; } /** Props for the HeaderLayout component slots. / export interface HeaderLayoutSlotProps { /** Props for the header slot. / header?: HeaderProps; /** Props for the content slot. / content?: ContentProps; } /** Represents an error that can occur in the HeaderLayout component. / export interface HeaderLayoutError { /** Optional icon to display with the error. / icon?: PlaceholderIcon; /** Optional title for the error. / title?: string; /** The error message to display. / message: string; } export type HeaderLayoutProps = PropsWithChildren<{ /** The title to be displayed in the header. / title: string | ReactElement; /** An optional subtitle to be displayed in the header. / subtitle?: string | ReactElement; /** Optional slots for custom components within the header layout. / slots?: HeaderLayoutSlots; /** Optional props for the custom slots. / slotProps?: HeaderLayoutSlotProps; /** Optional flag to indicate if the header layout is in a loading state. / loading?: boolean; /** Optional flag to indicate if the header layout is in a fetching state. / fetching?: boolean; /** Optional error object to be displayed in the header layout. / error?: HeaderLayoutError; }>; const DefaultErrorIcon = () => ( <ReportProblemIcon color="error" sx={{ width: 200, height: 200 }} /> ); /** A layout component that provides a header and content area with optional loading, fetching, and error states.
- [Layouts/HeaderLayout - Fetching](./?path=/story/layouts-headerlayout--fetching) {id:layouts-headerlayout--fetching} [story] [Docs](./?path=/docs/layouts-headerlayout--docs)

#### Layouts/HeaderLayout - Form
- Interface representing the slots for the HeaderLayout component. / export interface HeaderLayoutSlots { /** Optional slot for the header component. Should be a JSX element constructor that takes HeaderProps as props. / header?: JSXElementConstructor<HeaderProps>; /** Optional slot for the content component. Should be a JSX element constructor that takes ContentProps as props. / content?: JSXElementConstructor<ContentProps>; } /** Props for the HeaderLayout component slots. / export interface HeaderLayoutSlotProps { /** Props for the header slot. / header?: HeaderProps; /** Props for the content slot. / content?: ContentProps; } /** Represents an error that can occur in the HeaderLayout component. / export interface HeaderLayoutError { /** Optional icon to display with the error. / icon?: PlaceholderIcon; /** Optional title for the error. / title?: string; /** The error message to display. / message: string; } export type HeaderLayoutProps = PropsWithChildren<{ /** The title to be displayed in the header. / title: string | ReactElement; /** An optional subtitle to be displayed in the header. / subtitle?: string | ReactElement; /** Optional slots for custom components within the header layout. / slots?: HeaderLayoutSlots; /** Optional props for the custom slots. / slotProps?: HeaderLayoutSlotProps; /** Optional flag to indicate if the header layout is in a loading state. / loading?: boolean; /** Optional flag to indicate if the header layout is in a fetching state. / fetching?: boolean; /** Optional error object to be displayed in the header layout. / error?: HeaderLayoutError; }>; const DefaultErrorIcon = () => ( <ReportProblemIcon color="error" sx={{ width: 200, height: 200 }} /> ); /** A layout component that provides a header and content area with optional loading, fetching, and error states.
- [Layouts/HeaderLayout - Form](./?path=/story/layouts-headerlayout--form) {id:layouts-headerlayout--form} [story] [Docs](./?path=/docs/layouts-headerlayout--docs)

#### Layouts/HeaderLayout - List
- Interface representing the slots for the HeaderLayout component. / export interface HeaderLayoutSlots { /** Optional slot for the header component. Should be a JSX element constructor that takes HeaderProps as props. / header?: JSXElementConstructor<HeaderProps>; /** Optional slot for the content component. Should be a JSX element constructor that takes ContentProps as props. / content?: JSXElementConstructor<ContentProps>; } /** Props for the HeaderLayout component slots. / export interface HeaderLayoutSlotProps { /** Props for the header slot. / header?: HeaderProps; /** Props for the content slot. / content?: ContentProps; } /** Represents an error that can occur in the HeaderLayout component. / export interface HeaderLayoutError { /** Optional icon to display with the error. / icon?: PlaceholderIcon; /** Optional title for the error. / title?: string; /** The error message to display. / message: string; } export type HeaderLayoutProps = PropsWithChildren<{ /** The title to be displayed in the header. / title: string | ReactElement; /** An optional subtitle to be displayed in the header. / subtitle?: string | ReactElement; /** Optional slots for custom components within the header layout. / slots?: HeaderLayoutSlots; /** Optional props for the custom slots. / slotProps?: HeaderLayoutSlotProps; /** Optional flag to indicate if the header layout is in a loading state. / loading?: boolean; /** Optional flag to indicate if the header layout is in a fetching state. / fetching?: boolean; /** Optional error object to be displayed in the header layout. / error?: HeaderLayoutError; }>; const DefaultErrorIcon = () => ( <ReportProblemIcon color="error" sx={{ width: 200, height: 200 }} /> ); /** A layout component that provides a header and content area with optional loading, fetching, and error states.
- [Layouts/HeaderLayout - List](./?path=/story/layouts-headerlayout--list) {id:layouts-headerlayout--list} [story] [Docs](./?path=/docs/layouts-headerlayout--docs)

#### Layouts/HeaderLayout - Loading
- Interface representing the slots for the HeaderLayout component. / export interface HeaderLayoutSlots { /** Optional slot for the header component. Should be a JSX element constructor that takes HeaderProps as props. / header?: JSXElementConstructor<HeaderProps>; /** Optional slot for the content component. Should be a JSX element constructor that takes ContentProps as props. / content?: JSXElementConstructor<ContentProps>; } /** Props for the HeaderLayout component slots. / export interface HeaderLayoutSlotProps { /** Props for the header slot. / header?: HeaderProps; /** Props for the content slot. / content?: ContentProps; } /** Represents an error that can occur in the HeaderLayout component. / export interface HeaderLayoutError { /** Optional icon to display with the error. / icon?: PlaceholderIcon; /** Optional title for the error. / title?: string; /** The error message to display. / message: string; } export type HeaderLayoutProps = PropsWithChildren<{ /** The title to be displayed in the header. / title: string | ReactElement; /** An optional subtitle to be displayed in the header. / subtitle?: string | ReactElement; /** Optional slots for custom components within the header layout. / slots?: HeaderLayoutSlots; /** Optional props for the custom slots. / slotProps?: HeaderLayoutSlotProps; /** Optional flag to indicate if the header layout is in a loading state. / loading?: boolean; /** Optional flag to indicate if the header layout is in a fetching state. / fetching?: boolean; /** Optional error object to be displayed in the header layout. / error?: HeaderLayoutError; }>; const DefaultErrorIcon = () => ( <ReportProblemIcon color="error" sx={{ width: 200, height: 200 }} /> ); /** A layout component that provides a header and content area with optional loading, fetching, and error states.
- [Layouts/HeaderLayout - Loading](./?path=/story/layouts-headerlayout--loading) {id:layouts-headerlayout--loading} [story] [Docs](./?path=/docs/layouts-headerlayout--docs)

#### Layouts/HeaderLayout - Skeleton
- Interface representing the slots for the HeaderLayout component. / export interface HeaderLayoutSlots { /** Optional slot for the header component. Should be a JSX element constructor that takes HeaderProps as props. / header?: JSXElementConstructor<HeaderProps>; /** Optional slot for the content component. Should be a JSX element constructor that takes ContentProps as props. / content?: JSXElementConstructor<ContentProps>; } /** Props for the HeaderLayout component slots. / export interface HeaderLayoutSlotProps { /** Props for the header slot. / header?: HeaderProps; /** Props for the content slot. / content?: ContentProps; } /** Represents an error that can occur in the HeaderLayout component. / export interface HeaderLayoutError { /** Optional icon to display with the error. / icon?: PlaceholderIcon; /** Optional title for the error. / title?: string; /** The error message to display. / message: string; } export type HeaderLayoutProps = PropsWithChildren<{ /** The title to be displayed in the header. / title: string | ReactElement; /** An optional subtitle to be displayed in the header. / subtitle?: string | ReactElement; /** Optional slots for custom components within the header layout. / slots?: HeaderLayoutSlots; /** Optional props for the custom slots. / slotProps?: HeaderLayoutSlotProps; /** Optional flag to indicate if the header layout is in a loading state. / loading?: boolean; /** Optional flag to indicate if the header layout is in a fetching state. / fetching?: boolean; /** Optional error object to be displayed in the header layout. / error?: HeaderLayoutError; }>; const DefaultErrorIcon = () => ( <ReportProblemIcon color="error" sx={{ width: 200, height: 200 }} /> ); /** A layout component that provides a header and content area with optional loading, fetching, and error states.
- [Layouts/HeaderLayout - Skeleton](./?path=/story/layouts-headerlayout--skeleton) {id:layouts-headerlayout--skeleton} [story] [Docs](./?path=/docs/layouts-headerlayout--docs)

#### Layouts/HeaderLayout - Tabs
- Interface representing the slots for the HeaderLayout component. / export interface HeaderLayoutSlots { /** Optional slot for the header component. Should be a JSX element constructor that takes HeaderProps as props. / header?: JSXElementConstructor<HeaderProps>; /** Optional slot for the content component. Should be a JSX element constructor that takes ContentProps as props. / content?: JSXElementConstructor<ContentProps>; } /** Props for the HeaderLayout component slots. / export interface HeaderLayoutSlotProps { /** Props for the header slot. / header?: HeaderProps; /** Props for the content slot. / content?: ContentProps; } /** Represents an error that can occur in the HeaderLayout component. / export interface HeaderLayoutError { /** Optional icon to display with the error. / icon?: PlaceholderIcon; /** Optional title for the error. / title?: string; /** The error message to display. / message: string; } export type HeaderLayoutProps = PropsWithChildren<{ /** The title to be displayed in the header. / title: string | ReactElement; /** An optional subtitle to be displayed in the header. / subtitle?: string | ReactElement; /** Optional slots for custom components within the header layout. / slots?: HeaderLayoutSlots; /** Optional props for the custom slots. / slotProps?: HeaderLayoutSlotProps; /** Optional flag to indicate if the header layout is in a loading state. / loading?: boolean; /** Optional flag to indicate if the header layout is in a fetching state. / fetching?: boolean; /** Optional error object to be displayed in the header layout. / error?: HeaderLayoutError; }>; const DefaultErrorIcon = () => ( <ReportProblemIcon color="error" sx={{ width: 200, height: 200 }} /> ); /** A layout component that provides a header and content area with optional loading, fetching, and error states.
- [Layouts/HeaderLayout - Tabs](./?path=/story/layouts-headerlayout--tabs) {id:layouts-headerlayout--tabs} [story] [Docs](./?path=/docs/layouts-headerlayout--docs)
